creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: skull cap with embroidered neck extension and tassels; black white multicolored embroidery; three center motifs are amoeba-like forms; surrounding areas have geometric forms separated by single lines of embroidery; two tassels extend from back of cap; shorter tassels at end of extension; short fringe with three buttons at bottom of extension; edge of cap embroidered in multicolored geometric designs
dimension:
3 7/8 x 7 1/4 x 7 1/4 in. (9.84 x 18.42 x 18.42 cm) (cap only)
8 5/8 x 17 1/4 in. (21.91 x 43.82 cm) (object part, neck extension, without tassels)
title: Hat
